query.value: let basename = 'coredns_dns_request_duration_seconds'; InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_histogram_buckets(basename) | extend podname = tostring(Labels.pod_name) | extend podnamespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend hostname = tostring(Labels.hostName) | join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_histogram_counts(basename) | extend podname = tostring(Labels.pod_name) | extend podnamespace = tostring(Labels.namespace) | extend hostname = tostring(Labels.hostName)) on AgentId, Computer, Origin, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, hostname, podname, podnamespace | summarize buckettotal=sum(bucketdiff), total=sum(totaldiff) by AgentId, Computer, Origin, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, hostname, podname, podnamespace, le | sort by AgentId, Computer, Origin, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, hostname, podname, podnamespace, le asc | invoke pquery_histogram_quantile(0.99)
